title: What can I do in Task Manager
content:
Task Manager allows you to manage various analyses (we call them Tasks) you started on ETC site. Tasks are often completed in steps and they are listed in the table on this page.
  • Monitor the progress of your task (Status)
  • Check ownership of a task (Access)
  • Continue a task to the next step (Resume)
  • Go back and redo the critical step of a task (Rewind)
  • Remove one or more tasks (Delete)
  • Share your tasks with other ETC users (Share)

title: Resume Task
content: All incomplete tasks can be resumed Completed tasks are marked as

as its status.

Click to select the tasks you need to resume and click the Resume button. The page will redirect to the corresponding task's page.

title: Rewind Task
content: Each tool has one step requiring substantial user interaction. Rewind allows you to go back and redo that step. Click to select a task you need to redo, then click the Rewind button.

title: Delete Task
content: Click to select the tasks and then click the Delete button.

title: Share Task
content:
Sharing a task allows other users to contribute to your task.
  1. Click to select the task to share and click the Share button.
  2. Select one or more users from left and move them to the right, then click Shared with Selected
.

Sharing a task means that the shared-with user(s) will have the same task shown in their Task Manager and will have your input/output files for the task in their Shared folder in File Manager. The latest task status among all shared users is the status shown for all users for the task.
